body: @asuszenfonemerah the sex scenes are covered and unintense, and there are a lot of softcore trap doujins.
@HentaiCrepes since when fucking a trap is "softcore"?
this site has a lot of untranslated traps doujinshi/manga, especially those gekkan otokonoko and such. Man if only i'd paid more attention to my japanese class back in high school...
As I said before, this was the most disappointing doujin release from one of my favorite doujin artists Aogiri Penta... It's too damn softcore.
